original_text: But Lord you sent your people to a land far away. That is how you punished them. You blew them away with a storm that came from the east.
korean_text: 주께서 백성을 적당하게 견책하사 쫓아내실 때에 동풍 부는 날에 폭풍으로 그들을 옮기셨느니라

sentences.original_text: But Lord you sent your people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주여, 당신은 당신의 백성을 보내셨습니다

sentences.original_text: That is how you punished them
You blew them away with a storm
